jedi:AC.NAME: AC
jedi:AC.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *DC{!Upgrades!|>0=+} to your hand.

jedi:ApocalypseNow.NAME: Apocalypse Now
jedi:ApocalypseNow.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL If you discard at least 8 cards, NL deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

jedi:BattleThirst.NAME: Battle Thirst
jedi:BattleThirst.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in your deck, you have to enter combat rooms whenever you can.

jedi:BurstDark.NAME: Burst Dark
jedi:BurstDark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you Evoke an Orb with this card in hand, increase its damage by !M! until played.

jedi:BurstFrost.NAME: Burst Frost
jedi:BurstFrost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain additional Block equal to your Focus.
jedi:BurstFrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain additional Block equal to your Focus times !M!.

jedi:BurstLightning.NAME: Burst Lightning
jedi:BurstLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to your Focus. NL Is affected by *Electrodynamics.
jedi:BurstLightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to your Focus times !M!. NL Is affected by *Electrodynamics.

${ModID}:DC.NAME: DC
${ModID}:DC.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Channel a Lightning. NL Trigger its Evoke{!Upgrades!|>0= and passive} effect{!Upgrades!|>0=s}. NL Exhaust.

jedi:EchoStrike.NAME: Echo Strike
jedi:EchoStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play every other *Echo *Strike played this combat.

jedi:Entomb.NAME: Entomb
jedi:Entomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Add !jedi:SecondMN! *Flash *Freezes into your hand.
jedi:Entomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Add !jedi:SecondMN! *Flash *Freezes+ into your hand.

jedi:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
jedi:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Innate. NL }When a Status card is created, NL Exhaust it.

jedi:FlashFreeze.NAME: Flash Freeze
jedi:FlashFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Channel 1 Frost and NL trigger its passive effect. NL Exhaust.
jedi:FlashFreeze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Channel 1 Frost and NL trigger its passive effect !M! times. NL Exhaust.

jedi:FortuneCookie.NAME: Fortune Cookie
jedi:FortuneCookie.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw a card if you discarded a card.

jedi:Furiosity.NAME: Furiosity
jedi:Furiosity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL Select one of them. NL It costs 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: reduce its cost to 0 this turn.

jedi:HatTrick.NAME: Hat Trick
jedi:HatTrick.DESCRIPTION: Draw ALL Shivs and NL increase damage dealt by Shivs by !M! for each Shiv drawn.

jedi:Khahiri.NAME: Khahiri
jedi:Khahiri.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When shown while *Scrying, increase this card damage by !M!.

jedi:LeechingStrike.NAME: Leeching Strike
jedi:LeechingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

jedi:MakeshiftSword.NAME: Makeshift Sword
jedi:MakeshiftSword.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

jedi:Overlook.NAME: Overlook
jedi:Overlook.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL If you discarded an Attack, enter Wrath. NL Otherwise, enter Calm.

jedi:PredictedStrike.NAME: Predicted Strike
jedi:PredictedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

jedi:PromisingFuture.NAME: Promising Future
jedi:PromisingFuture.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw !jedi:SecondMN! cards. NL They Exhaust when played. NL Exhaust.

jedi:Prosperity.NAME: Prosperity
jedi:Prosperity.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When shown while *Scrying, draw 1 additional card next turn.

jedi:RedIncense.NAME: Red Incense
jedi:RedIncense.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you discard, Exhaust or Scry this card, gain !M! Strength.

Scrape.NAME: Scrape
Scrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards NL that cost 0.

jedi:WavingIron.NAME: Waving Iron
jedi:WavingIron.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M!. NL Deal !D! damage if you discarded a card.

jedi:acidrain.NAME: Acid Rain
jedi:acidrain.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison for each card discarded this turn.

jedi:better.NAME: Better
jedi:better.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand. NL Add *Faster to your hand. NL Exhaust.
jedi:better.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand. NL This turn, whenever you draw a card, upgrade it. NL Add *Do *it *Faster to your hand. NL Exhaust.

jedi:blockon.NAME: Block-On
jedi:blockon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Lock-On to each enemy that intends to attack.

jedi:bloodyhammer.NAME: Bloody Hammer
jedi:bloodyhammer.DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade a card in your hand. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
jedi:bloodyhammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade any number of cards in your hand and NL Lose !M! HP for each. NL Exhaust.

jedi:brewingpoison.NAME: Brewing Poison
jedi:brewingpoison.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust. NL Whenever you draw this card, increase its Poison by !jedi:SecondMN!. NL Whenever you discard this card, double its Poison.

jedi:bruteforce.NAME: Bruteforce
jedi:bruteforce.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Evoke your rightmost Lightning !M! times, hitting ALL enemies.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Exhaust.|>0=}

jedi:cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
jedi:cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Exhaust.
jedi:cleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

jedi:controlledanger.NAME: Controlled Anger
jedi:controlledanger.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Angers to your hand. NL Whenever you play an *Anger, Exhaust it.
jedi:controlledanger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Upgraded *Angers to your hand. NL Whenever you play an *Anger, Exhaust it.

jedi:darknesscall.NAME: Darkness Call
jedi:darknesscall.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Lock-On to an enemy with lowest HP. NL Evoke your rightmost Dark Orb. NL Exhaust.

jedi:faster.NAME: Faster
jedi:faster.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply Slow to an enemy. NL Add *Stronger to your hand. NL Exhaust.
jedi:faster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] NL Apply Slow to ALL enemies. NL Add *Makes *us *Stronger to your hand. NL Exhaust.

jedi:fear.NAME: Fear
jedi:fear.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Angers to your hand. NL Exhaust.
jedi:fear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! upgraded *Angers to your hand. NL Exhaust.

jedi:forcepull.NAME: Force Pull
jedi:forcepull.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw a card.

jedi:forcepush.NAME: Force Push
jedi:forcepush.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw a card.

jedi:frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
jedi:frostbite.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this card is drawn, lose 3 Strength this turn.

jedi:gatheringstorm.NAME: Gathering Storm
jedi:gatheringstorm.DESCRIPTION: For each non-Lightning orb Channeled this combat, Channel 1 Lightning. NL Exhaust.

jedi:harder.NAME: Harder
jedi:harder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Add *Better to your hand.
jedi:harder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Metallicize. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Add *Make *it *Better to your hand.

jedi:hate.NAME: Hate
jedi:hate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all *Angers in your discard pile and deal !D! damage for each. NL Exhaust.
jedi:hate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all *Angers in your discard pile and deal !D! damage for each.

jedi:hex.NAME: Hex
jedi:hex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.

jedi:meditation.NAME: Meditation
jedi:meditation.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, remove your rightmost Orb and gain !M! Focus.

jedi:nirvanicrebirth.NAME: Nirvanic Rebirth
jedi:nirvanicrebirth.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Heal !M! HP. NL When Retained, permanently increase its healing by !jedi:SecondMN!. NL Fleeting.

jedi:onestrike.NAME: One Strike
jedi:onestrike.DESCRIPTION: Kill a non-boss enemy. NL Fleeting.
jedi:onestrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Kill a non-boss enemy. NL Realize you wasted an [#FFFFFF]upgrade[]. NL Fleeting.

jedi:overflow.NAME: Overflow
jedi:overflow.DESCRIPTION: If you have no empty Orb slots, gain !M! Orb slot.
jedi:overflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have no empty Orb slots, gain !M! Orb slot. NL Otherwise, Channel !M! random Orb.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you have no empty Orb slots, gain !M! Orb slots.
If you have no empty Orb slots, gain !M! Orb slots. NL Otherwise, Channel !M! random Orbs.

jedi:pocketpoison.NAME: Pocket Poison
jedi:pocketpoison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw a card.

jedi:poisonivy.NAME: Poison Ivy
jedi:poisonivy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack a Poisoned enemy with a non-Shiv card, add !M! Shiv to your hand.
jedi:poisonivy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you attack a Poisoned enemy with a non-Shiv card, add !M! Shiv to your hand.

jedi:readyaimfire.NAME: Ready, Aim, Fire
jedi:readyaimfire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Evoke ALL orbs. NL Exhaust.

jedi:reiji.NAME: Reiji
jedi:reiji.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply 3 Lock-On. NL Exhaust.
jedi:reiji.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply 3 Lock-On. NL Channel !M! Lightning. NL Exhaust.

jedi:rejectivetoxin.NAME: Storm of Toxin
jedi:rejectivetoxin.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Apply !M! Poison for each card discarded.
jedi:rejectivetoxin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Apply !M! Poison for each card discarded.

jedi:sharpshooter.NAME: Sharpshooter
jedi:sharpshooter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy has Lock-On, gain [E] and draw a card.

jedi:spotbugs.NAME: Spot Bugs
jedi:spotbugs.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to buff, gain !M! Orb slot.
jedi:spotbugs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to buff, gain !M! Orb slot and NL Channel !M! random Orb.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to buff, gain !M! Orb slots.
If the enemy intends to buff, gain !M! Orb slots and NL Channel !M! random Orbs.

jedi:strikingstrike.NAME: Strikeing Strike
jedi:strikingstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random Strike on the same enemy. NL Exhaust.
jedi:strikingstrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random upgraded Strike on the same enemy. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Card preview will display last card played by this.

jedi:stronger.NAME: Stronger
jedi:stronger.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Strength at the start of your turn.
jedi:stronger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Strength at the start of your turn.

jedi:studyfrost.NAME: Study Frost
jedi:studyfrost.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Frost-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
jedi:studyfrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Frost-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

jedi:studypoison.NAME: Study Poison
jedi:studypoison.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Poison-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
jedi:studypoison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Poison-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

jedi:studyshivs.NAME: Study Shivs
jedi:studyshivs.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Shivs-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
jedi:studyshivs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Shivs-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

jedi:suffering.NAME: Suffering
jedi:suffering.DESCRIPTION: For each Attack Exhausted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

jedi:test.NAME: Test
jedi:test.DESCRIPTION: If you're reading this, you're either me or something went wrong.
jedi:test.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: That or you're very curious on github.

jedi:thedog.NAME: The Dog
jedi:thedog.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL Cannot be removed from your hand.

jedi:unlimitedpower.NAME: Unlimited Power
jedi:unlimitedpower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. NL jedi:Unlimited.

jedi:unstablefumes.NAME: Unstable Fumes
jedi:unstablefumes.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, apply !jedi:SecondMN! Poison to ALL enemies.
